messages.content:
user controls random emoji using 'y' (up left), 'u' (up right), 'g' (left), 'h' (pass), 'j' (right), 'b' (down left), 'n' (down right); background tiled https://picsum.photos/16/16; 10 random emoji monsters and collectible items; score and health display; gems increase score, monsters decrease health
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
